languages.text: "Так больше не может продолжаться. Я должна очиститься. Я отправлюсь под своды святого корабля, моля о прощении. И выйду из него обновленной. Я знаю. Я верю".

traits.locale_text: "Так больше не может продолжаться. Я должна очиститься. Я отправлюсь под своды святого корабля, моля о прощении. И выйду из него обновленной. Я знаю. Я верю".

languages.text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."
languages.original_text: "Так больше не может продолжаться. Я должна очиститься. Я отправлюсь под своды святого корабля, моля о прощении. И выйду из него обновленной. Я знаю. Я верю".

traits.locale_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."
"This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."
"This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."
"This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."
"This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

languages.text: 「こんなことは続けられない。私は自分を浄化しなくてはならない。私は許しを乞うため、神聖なる船に乗る。そして私は新しい自分になる。そうなると分かっている。そう信じている」
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなことは続けられない。私は自分を浄化しなくてはならない。私は許しを乞うため、神聖なる船に乗る。そして私は新しい自分になる。そうなると分かっている。そう信じている」

languages.text: “我不能再这样下去了，我必须净化自己的灵魂。我要进去圣船，乞求宽恕，届时我将焕然一新。我知道，我坚信这点。”
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: “我不能再这样下去了，我必须净化自己的灵魂。我要进去圣船，乞求宽恕，届时我将焕然一新。我知道，我坚信这点。”

languages.text: « Je ne peux continuer sur cette voie. Voici venue l'heure de la purification. Je vais entrer dans le vaisseau sacré, demander pardon pour mes fautes et renaître à ce monde. Je le sais. J'en ai l'intime conviction. »
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux continuer sur cette voie. Voici venue l'heure de la purification. Je vais entrer dans le vaisseau sacré, demander pardon pour mes fautes et renaître à ce monde. Je le sais. J'en ai l'intime conviction. »

languages.text: «No puedo seguir así. Debo purificarme. Entraré en la nave sagrada a suplicar perdón. Y emergeré renovada. Lo sé. Creo firmemente en ello».
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo seguir así. Debo purificarme. Entraré en la nave sagrada a suplicar perdón. Y emergeré renovada. Lo sé. Creo firmemente en ello».

languages.text: "Das muss aufhören. Ich muss mich selbst reinigen. Ich werde das heilige Schiff betreten und um Vergebung bitten. Und ich werde es erneuert verlassen. Ich weiß es. Ich glaube daran."
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: "Das muss aufhören. Ich muss mich selbst reinigen. Ich werde das heilige Schiff betreten und um Vergebung bitten. Und ich werde es erneuert verlassen. Ich weiß es. Ich glaube daran."

languages.text: "Bu böyle devam edemez. Kendimi arındırmalıyım. Kutsal gemiye girip bağışlanmak için yakaracağım. Yeniden doğarak çıkacağım. Bunu biliyorum... Buna inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "This cannot go on. I must cleanse myself. I will enter the sacred ship to beg forgiveness. And I will emerge renewed. I know it. I believe."

traits.locale_text: "Bu böyle devam edemez. Kendimi arındırmalıyım. Kutsal gemiye girip bağışlanmak için yakaracağım. Yeniden doğarak çıkacağım. Bunu biliyorum... Buna inanıyorum."
